game.title: The Missing Sword
game.objective: Retrieve the missing sword from the Goblin King
game.description: The king's sword has been stolen by the Goblin King, and the king has asked you to retrieve it.
game.reward: The king's favor and a new sword

task.description: The Goblin Caves are located in the Misty Mountains, just north of the village.
The Goblin King is a powerful warrior, so be prepared for a tough fight.
Once you have defeated the Goblin King, search his throne room for the missing sword.

task.objective: Return the sword to King Oberon
task.description: Once you have retrieved the sword, return it to King Oberon in the castle.
